title: Postal.2.Complete.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Postal.2.Complete.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release Info:


Year: 2003
Genre: Action / Adventure / Indie
Developer: Running With Scissors
Publisher: Running With Scissors
Publication Type: RiP
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: Not required




System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Pentium 3 with a clock speed of 1133 MHz or AMD Athlon
processor with a clock frequency of 733 MHz
Memory: 128 MB
Video: 32 MB (GeForce 2 or Radeon)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 3.5 GB


Game information:

Live a life of week Dude, the ordinary person engaged in the most
ordinary things. It would seem that what can go wrong during the
purchase of milk, a belated return books to the library and get
the autograph of Gary Coleman? Blow up, shred and pissing,
looking for adventure on his head in a satirical world
Postal 2 - game full of black humor. Meet the bad old
mascot Crotch visit Uncle Dave at his besieged base of
religious fanatics, fight with the Taliban, living in the
sewers, and do not let the redneck-homosexual, corrupt
cops and mad elephants break the protagonist point.

Explore the open spaces occupied by people with a
surprisingly unpredictable artificial intelligence.
Enlist the help of Champa, poluvernogo pitbull Dude.
Use an arsenal of weapons, ranging from ordinary spades
to funny grenade. Natravlyayte dogs on enemies! Use cats
as silencers! Drenches everything and everyone
in the urine and gasoline! Your dark dreams come true!

Game Features:

Freedom of choice: the amount of violence in Postal 2 depends on the player.

Large open world.

Explore the area and follow the instructions as you want.
Interact with the characters.

Unpredictability: even if you decide to go peacefully,
it is still sometimes have to deal with people
who at any moment can go crazy!

Game and editor based on the engine, Unreal, which
makes the creation of modifications easier, moreover,
for the game is already available many extras.


Repack Features:

Postal 2 Complete
Version of the game - v1415 Hotfix 2
Cut multiplayer
Do not recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice

Additions:
Apocalypse Weekend Add-on
